name: Stellar Decay
description:
CONTROLS:

-Rotate the ship left/right: Q/E

-Movement : WASD

---Forward thruster: W

---Side thrusters: AD

---Backward thruster: S

-Interaction: SPACEBAR

---Press space to get fuel from asteroids or shop at planets

-Shoot: LMB/RMB

---Shoot starboard side: RMB

----Shoot port side: LMB

-Buttons and UI: LMB

-Zoom out mode: Z + Mouse movement

-Exit Zoom out mode: Z

CREDITS:

Art:

-Tiffany Johnson

-Kyle Solverson

Sound Design:

-Matt Fisher

-Riley Mehki

Programming:
